discourse_list.title: Collateral Onboarding Call #24: Harbor Trade Credit - Wednesday, January 20 18:00 UTC

content.content: Collateral Onboarding Call #24: Harbor Trade Credit - Wednesday, January 20 18:00 UTC  Harbor Trade Credit1280×720 57.8 KB  Time in your local-timezone format: 2021-01-20T18:00:00Z  Dial In Details Zoom call Passcode: RWA-WG  Intro An open discussion where we discuss projects and potential assets for MCD, open for anyone to join. If you’d like to present, check out this thread.  Agenda  Intro by @juan   Harbor Trade Credit - https://harbortradecredit.com/  MIP6: [HTC-DROP] MIP6 Application: Harbor Trade Credit DROP: Short Term Trade Receivables Harbor is a FinTech firm focusing on Supply Chain Finance (SCF) and working capital solutions to improve the cash conversion cycle. Harbor’s programs allow for early payments to suppliers so that buyers can optimize their own liquidity through trade credit.  Attn: @amyjung , @juan, @SebVentures, @Will, @bcd, @_LS, @LongForWisdom, @Akiva @RepoTactics, @psychonaut, @mario, @spin, @Planet_X, @Jason, @ultraschuppi, @g_dip, @ejbarraza

Collateral Call Summary - Episode #25  January 20th, 2021 Agenda   00:00: Intro with Juan Guillén.  00:47 RWA Working Group updates with Sébastien Derivaux  02:54: Harbor Trade Credit with Blake Coler-Dark, Rana Mookherjee, Bryan Maloney  32:28: Q&A and Discussion about Harbor Trade Credit  46:42: Outro  Video https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=7lHc8HsysmQ Introduction Juan Guillén Agenda and Preamble 00:00  Welcome to another MakerDAO Collateral Call. Today we are joined by Harbor Trade Credit. I’m going to let them do justice to their project Before that, I think Seb wants to share a couple of words about what the RWA Working Group is doing and how we are advancing on this front. Discussions about collateral happen in the Forum.   RWA Working Group Updates 1920×1080 70.8 KB Harbor Trade Credit  [HTC-DROP] MIP6 Application: Harbor Trade Credit DROP: Short Term Trade Receivables  Blake Coler-Dark, Rana Mookherjee, Bryan Maloney Presentation 02:54 HTC1920×1080 147 KB Our team1920×1080 188 KB Innovative asset classes1920×1080 162 KB MakerDAO Collateral Call1920×1080 159 KB Who is Harbor?1920×1080 244 KB Our focus: international trade1920×1080 211 KB What is trade finance?1920×1080 192 KB Cash conversion cycle problem1920×1080 195 KB Harbor supply chain finance1920×1080 186 KB Client focus1920×1080 291 KB Case studies & use cases1920×1080 253 KB Harbor and Centrifuge1920×1080 198 KB Discussion  32:28 - Will Remor: Could you go a little more in depth into how your team does the risk assessment process internally on each of those buyers? 44:03 - Juan Guillén: Where can people find more information about Harbor Trade Credit? 46:18 - Juan Guillén: Seb, any last words from the RWA Working Group?  Closing Comment Juan Guillén Outro 46:42  Thanks, everyone, from Throttle Capital and from Harbor Trade Credit for joining us. It was great having you. As always, let’s keep the conversation going in the forum. Next week we’ll have Lido  Credits   @blimpa produced this summary. Everyone who spoke and presented on the call, listed in the headers.
